rooms.description: Two-car garage with adequate lighting and ventilation; designed to accommodate two vehicles comfortably.
Spacious living area with a North-facing view to maximize natural light as per Vastu principles. Includes built-in seating areas.
Dining area with an adjoining kitchen; designed to allow easy serving access and open space planning.
Functional and energy-efficient kitchen setup with modern appliances. Adheres to local building codes for ventilation.
Service area including utility rooms and storage; designed to optimize space usage on the ground floor.

openings.description: North-facing entrance ensuring positive energy flow and natural light; includes a reception area with integrated lighting.
Window opening on the side wall for additional ventilation and view, adhering to Vastu principles for balanced energy.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony offering serene North-facing views. Incorporates natural ventilation and ample storage.
Guest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort; includes built-in wardrobes and additional seating space.
Well-planned bathroom with waterproof finishes and efficient drainage. Adheres to local norms for plumbing and safety.
Functional study area with ample natural light and quiet surroundings; designed as a flexible space for work or leisure.

openings.description: Balcony window ensuring privacy and providing a view; designed to maximize natural ventilation.
Service exit door for the first floor leading to the ground level staircase or service area.
